t: Hear*pn my prayer, O Lord;*s give*ld ear to my pleas for mercy! In*ld your faithfulness answer me, in your righteousness!
Enter*ln not into judgment with your servant, for*ld no one living is righteous before you.
For*pn the enemy has pursued my soul; he*ld has crushed my life to the ground; he*ld has made me sit in darkness like those long dead.
Therefore*ln my spirit faints within me; my*ld heart within me is appalled.
I*pn remember the days of old; I*ld meditate on all that you have done; I*ld ponder the work of your hands.
I*ln stretch out my hands to you; my*ld soul thirsts for you like a parched land. Selah*ig
Answer*pn me quickly, O Lord!*s My*ld spirit fails! Hide*ln not your face from me, lest*ld I be like those who go down to the pit.
Let*ln me hear in the morning of your steadfast love, for*ld in you I trust. Make*ln me know the way I should go, for*ld to you I lift up my soul.
Deliver*pn me from my enemies, O Lord!*s I*ld have fled to you for refuge.
Teach*ln me to do your will, for*ld you are my God! Let*ln your good Spirit lead me on*ld level ground!
For*pn your nameâ€™s sake, O Lord,*s preserve my life! In*ld your righteousness bring my soul out of trouble!
And*ln in your steadfast love you will cut off my enemies, and*ld you will destroy all the adversaries of my soul, for*ld I am your servant.
